title: [Large-Scale] Student Discussion Process Design and Implementation Strategies for Problem-Solving Classes

context.prior_knowledge: Basic PBL (Problem-Based Learning) design theory and discussion facilitation skills
context.additional_context: Program strengthening pre-service teachers' capacity to design discussion-based problem-solving lessons applicable in actual secondary classrooms

learning_goals: Learners can design discussion-centered classes combining PBL and Lesson Study (LS) with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can visualize and evaluate student discussion processes using digital tools (word clouds, discussion analysis software).
Learners can diagnose discussion participation patterns and develop intervention strategies by applying quantitative methods such as cumulative keyword frequency analysis.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
